Package ohos.data.distributed.common

Class KvManagerFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.data.distributed.common.KvManagerFactory

  • public class KvManagerFactory
extends Object
    A factory that manages KvManager instances, including creating and obtaining KvManager instances.
    Since:
    1
    SystemCapability
    SystemCapability.Data#DATA_DISTRIBUTEDDATAMGR

      • getInstance

        public static final KvManagerFactory getInstance​()
        Obtains a KvManagerFactory instance.

        A KvManagerFactory instance can be used to create and obtain a KvManager object.

        Returns:
        Returns the KvManagerFactory instance.
        Since:
        1

      • createKvManager

        public KvManager createKvManager​(KvManagerConfig config)
                          throws KvStoreException
        Creates a KvManager instance based on the configuration information.

        You must pass KvManagerConfig to provide configuration information for creating the KvManager instance.

        Parameters:
        config - Indicates the KvStore configuration information, including the user information and package name.
        Returns:
        Returns the KvManager instance.
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if input is invalid.
        Since:
        1

      • registerKvStoreServiceDeathRecipient

        public void registerKvStoreServiceDeathRecipient​(KvStoreServiceDeathRecipient deathObserver)
                                          throws KvStoreException
        Register KvStore Service Death Recipient
        Parameters:
        deathObserver - it will be notified when service died
        Throws:
        KvStoreException - Throws this exception if any of the following errors occurs: SERVER_UNAVAILABLE, DB_ERROR, PERMISSION_DENIED, and IPC_ERROR.
        Since:
        1

        Throws:
